body:
Day 11 - Manga 260*
This was the best fucking shit that I have ever seen. The shitty art style, the super random dialogue and the bad translation make this the best manga that I've ever read.
10/10. My first 10/10, one hundred percent will come back.
Not sure what the fuck I read since I'm still baffled after the re-take series 5/10
Criminally underrated. Such a shame that after almost 7 years, I'm the first person making a comment.
